supplyDemandQuery.title: final energy consumption by sector and fuel
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and ((@name='building' or @name='industry' or @name='transportation') or (exists(child::keyword/@final-energy)))]//*[@type='input' and not(@name='limestone' or @name='process heat cement' or @name='industrial energy use' or @name='industrial feedstocks' or @name='renewable' or contains(@name, 'trn') or @name='oil-credits')]/ demand-physical[@unit='EJ']/node()
